metadata.description: One second Marine Corporal Oliver "Ollie" Steele is captured by terrorists. The next he is mysteriously transported to the Plane of Imaginings, a land where dreams and nightmares actually come from. Ollie’s luck really seems to pick up when he is found by a beautiful young woman with pointy ears named Astrina, who takes him to her village called Donnelly. But Ollie’s luck disappears just as quickly when the villagers claim he is one of three exiles prophesized to rescue their village. From what? Well, to start with, there’s that ravenous monster attacking Donnelly. From award winning comic artists and writers Barb Jacobs and Steven Philip Jones comes the collected fantasy webcomic for all ages to enjoy. "An engaging and entertaining tale. Harkens back to the glory days of Elfquest." – Phil Hester (Green Arrow, T.H.U.N.D.E.R. Agents)
metadata.name: Talismen: Return of the Exile
